Prisma is a modern database toolkit that simplifies database management and access for application developers
* It is An autogenerated and type-safe query builder for Node.js and TypeScript.
* It allows you to perform database operations like querying, inserting, updating, and deleting records using a fluent API.


// ----------------- To make the .ts file to the .js file 
command:-    tsc.cmd -b 

//---------- run the file 
node dist/index.js

// to migrate the data into the postgreSQL use the command as 
npx prisma generate
